alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 3:55AM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph in higher elevations. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected in higher elevations. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Cherokee and Clay Counties. In Tennessee, East Polk County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
